alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wasatch...northwestern Duchesne...south central Summit and southwestern Uinta Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 9 miles northwest of Mirror Lake, or 21 miles southeast of Coalville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Samak, Mirror Lake and Trial Lk. This includes Mirror Lake Highway between mile markers 5 and 32, and between mile markers 36 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
